name: Pedro Land
description:
A retro run-and-gun platformer set in a western world.

You play as Pedro Sombrero, a man who now owns an ancient tower.

His home is now in danger thanks to invasive monsters from the east.

Your goal is to stop the invasions at their source!

controls:

A - left

D - right

S - down

W - up/interact with doors, people, etc

L - jump

K - shoot

Enter - select on title screen/stop reading dialogue

Try to test yourself by collecting every coin in the game... without DYING!!

There is also a secret in the game. Can you find it??
